comment.author: 24882165@N07
comment._content: Gorgeous postcard image - really sharp and beautifully hand colored.  Postcards were such an art form back then, especially the outstanding pre-WWI lithographed cards from Germany, many of them beautifully embossed.  Thanks for sharing this!

comment.author: 27070380@N03
comment._content: Truly Amazing! Hi I'm the admin for Historic Lethbridge & area and I would love to have it added!
comment.authorname: The Lost Canuck Photography by Cody Kapcsos
